topic: Movie Review Sentiment Analysis

  entities:
    Joe Piscopo|Person
    Moroni|Person
    Maureen Stapleton|Person
    Alan "The Skipper" Hale Jr.|Person

  proposition: The movie review contains positive sentiment about the film.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    movie review|DESCRIBED_BY|positive sentiment

  proposition: Joe Piscopo is described as being funny in the movie.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Joe Piscopo|DESCRIBED_BY|funny

  proposition: The Moroni character is characterized as hilarious or a "scream".
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Moroni|DESCRIBED_BY|hilarious
    Moroni|DESCRIBED_BY|scream

  proposition: Maureen Stapleton is noted as a scene stealer.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Maureen Stapleton|DESCRIBED_BY|scene stealer

  proposition: Alan "The Skipper" Hale Jr. appears as a police sergeant in the movie.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Alan "The Skipper" Hale Jr.|ROLE|police sergeant

topic: Image Perturbation Types Catalog

  entities:
    Noise|Feature
    Blur|Feature
    Environmental Perturbations|Feature
    Transformation Perturbations|Feature
    Rotation Perturbations|Feature

  proposition: Image perturbation types include noise categories.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Image perturbation types|CONTAINS|Noise categories

  proposition: Noise categories include Clean, Gaussian Noise, Shot Noise, Impulse Noise.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Noise categories|CONTAINS|Clean
    Noise categories|CONTAINS|Gaussian Noise
    Noise categories|CONTAINS|Shot Noise
    Noise categories|CONTAINS|Impulse Noise

  proposition: Blur categories include Defocus Blur, Glass Blur, Motion Blur, Zoom Blur.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Blur categories|CONTAINS|Defocus Blur
    Blur categories|CONTAINS|Glass Blur
    Blur categories|CONTAINS|Motion Blur
    Blur categories|CONTAINS|Zoom Blur

  proposition: Environmental perturbations include Snow, Frost, Fog, Brightness, Contrast.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Environmental perturbations|CONTAINS|Snow
    Environmental perturbations|CONTAINS|Frost
    Environmental perturbations|CONTAINS|Fog
    Environmental perturbations|CONTAINS|Brightness
    Environmental perturbations|CONTAINS|Contrast

  proposition: Transformation perturbations include Elastic Transform, Pixelate, JPEG compression.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Transformation perturbations|CONTAINS|Elastic Transform
    Transformation perturbations|CONTAINS|Pixelate
    Transformation perturbations|CONTAINS|JPEG compression

  proposition: Rotation perturbations include Quarter Turn Right, Quarter Turn Left, Upside Down, Horizontal Flip.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Rotation perturbations|CONTAINS|Quarter Turn Right
    Rotation perturbations|CONTAINS|Quarter Turn Left
    Rotation perturbations|CONTAINS|Upside Down
    Rotation perturbations|CONTAINS|Horizontal Flip

topic: Visual Language Model Hallucination

  entities:
    GPT-4V|Model
    LLaVA|Model
    HallusionBench|Dataset

  proposition: GPT-4V and LLaVA demonstrate different performance on visual perception tasks.
    entity-entity relationships:
    GPT-4V|COMPARED_WITH|LLaVA

  proposition: Some model responses contain inaccurate interpretations of visual information.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    model responses|DESCRIBED_BY|inaccurate interpretations

  proposition: HallusionBench dataset tests visual dependent and visual supplement scenarios.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    HallusionBench|TESTS|visual dependent scenarios
    HallusionBench|TESTS|visual supplement scenarios

  proposition: Models can provide incorrect statements about image and map contents.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Models|CAPABILITY|provide incorrect statements
    Models|INCORRECT_ON|image contents
    Models|INCORRECT_ON|map contents

  proposition: Hallucination examples highlight challenges in visual language understanding.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Hallucination examples|HIGHLIGHTS|challenges in visual language understanding
